description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.",
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Project Background
The Department of National Defence has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) to procure specified items.

## Tender Information
- **Reference Number**: PW-23-01026564
- **Amendment Number**: 1
- **Solicitation Number**: W8482-231066/A
- **Publication Date**: 2023-03-06
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-04-03T14:00:00
- **Amendment Date**: 2023-03-09

## Tender Description
The Department of National Defence is seeking bids for the following items:

* **Item 1**: Vertical Clamp, Part No.: FE1485, Quantity: 60
	+ To be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
	+ Complies with GSIN: N6230, NSN: 01-6073798
* **Item 2**: Vertical Clamp, Part No.: FE1485, Quantity: 375
	+ To be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
	+ Complies with GSIN: N6230, NSN: 01-6073798

## Notice Information
This RFP is open to bidders and select distributors as specified in the NIBS classification system. Bidders must submit their offers in the official language of the service proposed. The Ministry retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on the terms of the contract.

## Selection Criteria
The selection of a contractor will be based on the tenders submitted in accordance with the Procurement Act and Regulations.

## Evaluation Criteria
Evaluation will be based on:
* Lowest first Article (LFA) qualification and compliance with the terms and conditions of the contract
* Competitiveness of the bid price
* Response to the technical requirements and evaluation criteria of the contract

## Trade Agreements
This RFP is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Regions of Opportunity
This RFP is open to bidders operating in Canada and internationally.

## Region of Delivery
Delivery is requested to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

## Procurement Method
This RFP will follow a competitive open bidding process.

You can now contact Katharine Barker at Katharine.Barker2@forces.gc.ca for more information.
